TopicTitle: [Old] Dark Days - Dying of the light. - Kopernicus mod. (Continuation in works)

Articles.Content:
What do you guys whant to see most out of this mod?

Kerbol retextured as dying star.

Planets retextured and edited (atmosphere thickness, temperature, Minmus melting maybe).

Famous nearby star you were talking about.
What do you guys think of the debris ring around the sun?
Anyone experienced with making shiny spaceship parts?
This is going to be my favourite system change mod. Please keep up the awesome and stunning work.

This is going to be my favourite system change mod. Please keep up the awesome and stunning work.

Thank you sir wanna be a beta-tester?

- - - Updated - - -

Anyone who can correctly guess what this is gets a cookie!

- - - Updated - - -

This is going to be my favourite system change mod. Please keep up the awesome and stunning work.

Wait? did you say: system change?? No!! this is game change!
It's Jool

It's Jool

Sorry guess again

Good idea though, I will make jool look like that.

Sorry guess again

Good idea though, I will make jool look like that.

Jool would be too far away to become as red as this. It may change coloration though, albeit only a little.

I bet you were showing Eve.

Intresting mod, it would create some real urgency. Get to space or perish on a dying world

It would be realy cool if you could make the Sun grow, eventual sucking Kerbin Whole. After that you need to have somehow established a colony elsewhere

Edited September 18, 2015 by FreeThinker
Hmm interesting

Jool would be too far away to become as red as this. It may change coloration though, albeit only a little.

I bet you were showing Eve.

Actually it is hades, A brown dwarf and binary twin to perseus the star that the new kerbal homeland will soon orbit.

- - - Updated - - -

Intresting mod, it would create some real urgency. Get to space or perish on a dying world

It would be realy cool if you could make the Sun grow, eventual sucking Kerbin Whole. After that you need to have somehow established a colony elsewhere

My thoughts exactly.

Ok. Sometime i'll send you a copy, The mod is not ready as of yet but soon it might .

Storyline and change summary now on the main page.

- - - Updated - - -

How do you guys feel about me completely replacing the default soundtrack to an album from stellardrone?

Also is it possible to replace all the ksc buildings with custom models?

Storyline and change summary now on the main page.

- - - Updated - - -

How do you guys feel about me completely replacing the default soundtrack to an album from stellardrone?

Also is it possible to replace all the ksc buildings with custom models?

Nah, the KSP soundtrack fits just fine. Feel free to add more. That's of course, just my opinion.

And the premise looks very interesting, I'm looking forward to this.

Edit: A passing rogue has shefted eve's orbit into a 45 degree inclination with a very heavy eccentricity. Also the oceans of lava don't seem to help its appearance.

Eve no longer has a atmosphere. though it does seem a little is left.

Oh snap! I've been thinking about the exact same thing this week! In fact, earlier today I sent an e-mail to XKCD for them to make a what-if scenario of this happening to Venus! How will you change Eve? Will you give it a dry ice surface? I mean it would take a lot of time for that atmosphere to radiate the heat but you did say millions of years.

Edit 2: Derp you mentioned exactly how.

Edited September 19, 2015 by More Boosters
I have temporarily laid off on kopernicus work for now as i am switching focus to the new part pack and career mode redo.
Me want. Very bad.

Me want. Very bad.

'Know ya do its coming soon. If you want i will send you a prototype. But everything is subject to change and nothing is complete.
Wow, very cool!

Very well then guys. http://www./view/90a1d0a1ocscjea/Dark_Days

here you go. But remember that it is not done and many things have yet to be added, Removed, Or changed. So please understand that this is very early and very little of what i promise from this mod is yet included.

That said, Enjoy!
How will the new parts look like?

How will the new parts look like?

I cant give any screenshots right now. But they will be a mix of B9 and lackluster labs. And the R&D will be redone as well. The new Tech tree will go like this:

Start:

Player gets a few beginner parts.

Planetary Stage - 500 Science

Player then gets technology for interplanetary travel.

Stellar Stage - 5000 Science

Player gets a Alcubierre drive and more advanced science.

Colony Stage - 20000 Science

Player recieves custom parts using rabidninjawombat's civilian population, As a dependency.
Hey Daniel, I can help you with the development of the mod if you want.

Hey Daniel, I can help you with the development of the mod if you want.

I accept! Thank you! i have been having a extremely hard time just getting the kopernicus stuff done. Not to mention i promised a complete career mode overhaul that i am currently working on (It actually is easier) So yes, Please join me on this so i can work half and you the other half which would make this soooooooo much easier.

So please do come help. I really need it. (Not to be mistaken i am capable of doing it on my own but it isnt easy.)
